name: Conqueror's Blade: Season I - Seize the Crown
summary:
In this land, soldiers rise from nothing to be crowned kings. Those who live long enough may see empires rise from the ashes of an old world, only to burn all the same. The cycle repeats, like the coming of the dawn, the falling veil of night, or the changing of the seasons. War begets war.
As clashing swords ring and castle walls are torn asunder, the symphony of war calls out to distant lands and invites new challengers to fight for control of this land. A new dawn is rising, and with it, challengers to seize everything its light shines upon. Who will reign supreme, and who will fade away in the pages of history?
